EmailTemplate.name: 202006_Global_Legacy_IMU_HG5700_Email.Email 1-Miscellaneous
EmailTemplate.subject: Receive Near-Navigation Performance with Honeywell’s HG5700 IMU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
If you’re in the market for a non-ITAR, gyrocompass-grade IMU or INS (IMU+GNSS) to improve your system’s overall performance, Honeywell’s new HG5700 MEMS IMU <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/hg5700-inertial-measurement-unit?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_rmus_jj&utm_content=misc&utm_term=m1]]> is an affordable, option designed for your application.
For guidance and control applications where precision pointing and navigation are important to the success of your mission, our HG5700’s three ring laser gyroscopes, three vibrating beam accelerometers and electronics combine to provide one of the most rugged and accurate inertial navigation solutions on the market today.
COMPARE OUR SPECS HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/learn/products/sensors/datasheet/N61-2306-000-000_IMU-Comparison-Chart.pdf?download=true]]>
Honeywell’s HG5700 IMU is available in two different configurations with more coming soon to provide customers with a variety of options in performance, price and form factors.
To get more information and to speak to a Honeywell sales manager, please get in touch with us. CONTACT HONEYWELL <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/hg5700-inertial-measurement-unit?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_rmus_jj&utm_content=misc&utm_term=m1]]>
